scenario_text.value: Hey Takuma. What’s Kaito up to?

He was over by the apartments. Want me to
call him over for you?

Oh no, that’s okay! Miu will get mad if I do
that.

It’s just, I figured I should keep tabs on
him. They are brother and sister, after all.
Yeah, he always grills her when she’s around.
I get wanting to scold her if he’s worried.

It just has the opposite effect if he’s
annoying about it.

(Syakomon’s getting better and better at
handling Miu and Kaito’s dynamic.)

Have Minoru and Falcomon made up? I’m worried
about Kaito and Dracmon, too.
